scenario_text.value:
All right, now that we’ve taken care of our
supplies...
Why don’t we look around as much as we can?

The emergency rations are ready-to-eat, so we
could travel around and camp out with them.

You forget about those monsters roaming
around outside? Or have you finally lost it?

And remember, that fog out there is
dangerous.

That’s right! We have to keep away from the
fog.

Okay, sure, but the sun’s out right now. It’s
a perfectly clear, beautiful day.

True, the fog isn’t always out. It appears
only rarely, when you’ve nearly forgotten it.

Even so, Minoru, it could still roll in when
we least expect it and cut us off.
Oh... Huh.

But the professor, Saki and Shuuji might be
out there somewhere.

Not a chance! And if they were, there’s no
point in us going after them.

They may be out there, but we can’t risk
ourselves over a mere possibility.
Um...

What’s up, Haru?
Something wrong?
I found this in the forest...
Isn’t that the professor’s hat?

It is!
I thought it looked familiar...
I knew it! They’re here!
Then we need to go look for them!

Are you crazy?
We’re gonna be safer here.
Hmm...

Think about it: It’s already been a day,
right? Things are working out for us...

But with no food or drink to come by, those
guys could be in bad shape.
...Yes, that is true.
Fine. We won’t leave their fates to chance!

What? Hey!
You got a death wish?!
Not while we’re around!
Indeed. We’re going with her.

If any baddie comes your way, I’ll fight ’em
off for you, Aoi!
...Yes, I know. Thank you.

It’s too dangerous for Miyuki and Haru, so
they’ll stay here. Me, Takuma and Aoi will—

Now hold on, you expect me to play babysitter
for those brats?!

What’ll I do if another one of those spider
monsters attacks us?!

It’s not like this stupid caterpillar’s gonna
keep us safe!
Kunemon’s not some stupid caterpillar!
Kewww...
And Kunemon here can handle himself!

News to me!
Hmph...

(We might indeed run into something like
Dokugumon again.)
(We can’t abandon the guys out there just for Ryo.)
(What should I say to Ryo?)
Look after Haru and Miyuki.
Do what you want.
Nowhere is safe.

The guys out there may be in trouble, so we
must help them. I’m sorry, but we’re going.

And then, if the school is attacked, you’ll
be the only one who can protect the kids.
I told you that’s no good!

If something does happen...
I’ll be safer with you guys...
Do what you want, Ryo.

We’re going to help Saki and the others.
You can do whatever.
What are you saying?

You’d need to be strong for that.
Me? I’m a total weakling...
There are no safe places, Ryo.

There might be unknown dangers in the forest.
You might be attacked here, too.
You’ll have to figure out how to survive.

Ungh!
Who made you boss?

Fine, fine, I’ll go with you...
Better than sticking around here.

Weren’t you gonna hold down the fort, Ryo?
You can stay here, y’know.

Shut up! I’m saying I’ll cooperate
with you! Aren’t you happy?

Not really sensing that cooperative spirit
from you there, champ.

Minoru, enough of that, okay? Ryo is older
than you. You shouldn’t talk down to him.
Right. Sorry, Mom.
Hmph!

Whatever Ryo says, it would still be safer to
hide inside the school, wouldn’t it?
...I agree.

Hey, if there’s any trouble, just hide inside
that pantry, okay?
It’s fine. Don’t worry about us...

All right, then. You keep an eye on your
brother, okay, Miyuki?
Backwards...
Huh?
Oh, you mean...Haru looks after you?

(She’s nodding. It’s weird how Miyuki hardly
ever talks. I wish she would say more.)
...Bye.
...Yeah, uh, see you.

(I’m a little worried about leaving those two
behind...)

(But for now, we’d better focus on finding
the others, and quick.)
